price: (3) And of the people is he who disputes about Allāh without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَٰدِلُ فِي ٱللَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ وَيَتَّبِعُ كُلَّ شَيۡطَٰنٖ مَّرِيدٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yujādilu fī al-lahi bighayri ʿil'min wayattabiʿu kulla shayṭānin marīdin
